summary: Converts HTML tags to a simpler syntax
name: unhtml
description:
This script converts HTML tags into txt2tags marks. It was created by Aurelio Marinho Jargas, creator of txt2tags. For more info on txt2tags, visit http://txt2tags.sf.net/ .

INSTRUCTIONS
1. Open the HTML file on Vim and execute :so /path/to/unhtml.vim
2. A new <yourfile>.html.t2t will be saved.
3. Check the new .t2t file and correct by hand what has left.
